name: CDC to Kafka Scrub
description: Simple Salesforce CDC channel to a Heroku Kafka topic listener.

CLIENTID.description: Salesforce connected app OAuth client ID

CLIENTSECRET.description: Salesforce connected app OAuth client secret

SFDCPASSWORD.description: Salesforce user password - don't forget the token

KAFKA_TOPIC.description: Name of the Kafka Topic to write to

SF_CHANNEL.description: The object change event channel name. (starts with /data/...)
If you're using a shared Kafka tier, you need to enter the prefix to connect.
